name: Official Swede Mason "Buttery Biscuit Bass" T-Shirt
description:
Here we have the Official Swede Mason "Buttery Biscuit Bass" T-Shirt.

This t-shirt is printed with environmentally friendly water-based inks in black onto a white 100% cotton, premium heavyweight 'Fruit of The Loom' 200gsm tee.  Each are preshrunk to ensure reduced shrinkage.  Other features include double needle sleeves and hem, seamless twin needle collar and a taped neck for neatness and strength...Wash this tee at 30˚c and tumble dry slow! 

All of our t-shirt's are hand screen-printed onto the fabric using water based inks which are kinder to the environment than the ‘Plastisol’ inks used by many large manufacturers. The nice thing about hand-printed goods is that they have a unique touch and each print is ever so slightly different, a work of art in itself. The hand that made the print can be seen in the outcome and keeping that quality is a nod to the printing days of yesteryear, before machine printed goods and mass manufacture.

---------------------------------------
Sizes:

Mens Small: 36inch(chest); 97cm(actual chest); 69.5cm(length)
Mens Medium: 38-40inch(chest); 107cm(actual chest); 72cm(length)
Mens Large: 42inch(chest); 112cm(actual chest); 74.5cm(length)
Mens XL: 44inch(chest); 122cm(actual chest); 77cm(length)
Size Tolerance +/- 2.5cm	 	 	 	 	 	 

Ladies Small: 8-10; 30-22inch (to fit)
Ladies Medium: 12-14; 34-36inch
Ladies Large: 16-18; 38-40inch 	 	 	 	 

---------------------------------------

Shipping:

Orders are shipped within 5 working days of receipt of payment.  Orders are sent by second class post and delivered in one consignment.
